title: Bachelor favourite Elly Miles reveals she has struggled with body confidence issues
text:
She's the lovable country girl who quickly became a fan favourite on Matt Agnew's season of The Bachelor.

And on this week, Elly Miles revealed she struggled with body confidence issues in the months following the reality dating show.

Taking to Instagram, the nurse, 25, shared pictures from two different days; one day where she felt 'toned and fabulous' and another when she felt 'bloated and fluffy'.

'I would put myself down': Bachelor favourite Elly Miles (pictured) revealed she has struggled with body confidence issues on Friday

'I was feeling all kinds of sad and would look in the mirror and put myself down. It’s so important to love the skin your in - at all stages of life!' Elly captioned the post.

'It’s very easy in today’s society to get wrapped up in how your body should look & compare yourself to others.'

The country nurse revealed she had 'changed her mindset' by setting realistic goals and 'owning her body', which has made her more happy.

Honest: The nurse, 25, shared pictures from two different days; one day where she felt 'toned and fabulous' and another when she felt 'bloated and fluffy'. She is pictured on her 'bloated' day

Encouraging words: 'Sometimes you’re feeling toned & fabulous - sometimes you’re feeling bloated & fluffy. That’s just life! Both are you, both are GREAT,' she wrote

Elly encouraged her followers to 'focus on what’s right' with their body instead of 'what’s wrong with your body'.

'Sometimes you’re feeling toned & fabulous - sometimes you’re feeling bloated & fluffy. That’s just life! Both are you, both are GREAT,' she wrote.

Since the latest season of The Bachelor ended, Elly has launched her YouTube career with a vlog series of her travels and life in the countryside.

Claim to fame: On The Bachelor, Elly made it to the top five contestants along with Abbie Chatfield, Chelsie Mcleod, Helena Sauzier and Emma Roche

Last month, the beloved country girl documented her first ever trip abroad as she visited London for the Spice Girls reunion tour.

At the concert, Elly and her sister went wild as they sang along to hit Spice Girls tracks such as Who Do You Think You Are and Wannabe.

On The Bachelor, Elly made it to the top five contestants along with Abbie Chatfield, Chelsie Mcleod, Helena Sauzier and Emma Roche.
